name: HELLFROG
description:
"In hell, my body won't last more than 10 seconds. All I have is my gun and my tongue."

HELLFROG is a game where you use your shotgun and tongue to kill enemies in a hell where your health automatically decreases.

█Features

Top down shooter.

Play time : about 30 minutes.

Two difficulty levels :  Normal and Very Hard.

If you find the game difficult, you can use the "Assist Mode" to ease the difficulty level.

Twitter : https://twitter.com/lic_cake
